summary: Set in 1931, Sugar Cane Alley paints a rich impasto of native life under French colonial rules, filtered through the coming-of-age of a bright, sweetly opportunistic boy.
cast: Garry Cadenat|Darling Légitimus|Douta Seck|Joby Bernabé|Francisco Charles|Marie-Jo Descas|Marie-Ange Farot|Henri Melon|Eugène Mona|Joël Palcy|Serge Abattucci|Samuel Abraham|Albert Adea|Jose Aloha|Dominique Arfi|Dorothee Audibert|Emmanuel Beaudi|Louis Luc Bernex|Emilie Blameble|Norita Blamelbe|Gisèle Boisan|Emile Caserus|Max Cilla|Francis Coco|Mthieu Crico|Leon De la Guigneraye|Céline Delaunay-Belleville|Virginie Delaunay-Belleville|David Fadeau|Bernard Fergant|Clothaire Grivallier|Mathieu Grivallier|Victor Grivallier|Jacques Guinchard|Michael Guitteau|Tania Hamel|Miguel Huret|Sonia Joseph|Richard Labetan|André Lehr|Serge Lof|Maïté Marquet|Félix Mence|Monique Nelson|Ghislaine Pierre-Nicolas|Roger Promard|Joby Ravenet|Joseph Rene-Corail|Lina Sabinus|Laurent Saint-Cyr|Lucette Salibur|Edgar Septua|Félix Ursulet|Joseph Zobel
keywords: french caribbean|french antilles|raised by grandmother|martinican|title directed by female
title: Rue Cases Nègres
